data.message: I need help and the help Center doesn't have my answer

replies.message: Hey Megan. This is a great place to ask a question. Let us know how we can help you! -Kristin

Who do I contact about getting a friend unblocked from accessing her account? We tried to appeal her disabled account and it said her email wasn't associated with a disabled account. She still can't log in and it's been two weeks. She has many pictures of her daughter who passed away over the summer that she would like to access. Please help
She just wants to be able to get in for her pictures

We're very sorry to hear about your friend's loss, Megan. This may be a log in issue. Here are a few tips she can try to log into her account: http://on.fb.me/1NFwjwo. We hope this helps your friend! -Kristin
We tried all the tips on the help Center. Nothing worked. It says she could be blocked from logging in for a few hours or a few days. It's been over 2 weeks
